bike.description: C-10 Super Lite High Modulus carbon w/RIB (Re-inforced I Beam) & Integrated T-T construction, IST (Integrated Seat Tube), Integrated cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.

components.description: C-10 Super Lite High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option
NEW Rock Shox SID XX WC Carbon upper w/ PopLoc Remote & 1000mm Travel
NEW SRAM XX Carbon double GXP w/ Integrated BB Spindle, 28/42T
Schwalbe Racing Ralph EVO, 26 X 2.1" Foldable
NEW SRAM XX Carbon Hydraulic Disc, 185/160mm rotor
Ritchey WCS Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
NEW Richey WCS Streem Carbon w/ carbon rails
